00108 /******** int WINAPI RF_INIT_TYPE *************************/
00109 //        Function:    Set Reader contactless working mode
00110 //        Prototype:   int WINAPI rf_init_type(unsigned short icdev,
00111 //                                             unsigned char type)
00112 //        Parameter:   icdev:    [IN]  Device ID
00113 //                     type:     [IN]  reader working mode
00114 //        Return:      return 0 if successful
00115 //Explanation: this function is not effective to the readers only support single protocol.
00116 //        type = 'A': set CR500 into ISO14443A mode
00117 //        type = 'B': set TYPE_B mode
00118 //        type = 'r': set AT88RF020 card mode
00119 //        type = '1': set ISO15693 mode
00120 /*********************************************************/
00121 int (WINAPI* rf_init_type)(unsigned short icdev,unsigned char type);

00179 //                     pKey:     [IN]   encrypt key
00180 //                     keylen:   [IN]   length of key, 8 bytes for single DES, 
00181 //                                      16 bytes for triple DES
00182 //        Return:      return 0 if successful
00183 /*********************************************************/
